      • generateFormInstanceFromContext

        protected T generateFormInstanceFromContext()
        Sub classes can override this method to do some interception around form instance generation, especially some post processes.

        NOTE: DO NOT replace this method completely at sub class, if you want to do some customized form retrieving, override the method retrieveFormInstance(Map, String) instead.

        Returns:

      • saveTraceMap

        protected String saveTraceMap(String currentStep,
                  String renderTargetStep,
                  Map<String,Object> traceMap)
        Note: In fact, we should not save the trace map when some steps such as init step to avoid unnecessary memory usage, thus we call the skipSaveTraceMap(String, String, Map) to decide save or not. In other words ,the sub class have the responsibility to tell us save or not by overriding the method skipSaveTraceMap(String, String, Map).
        Parameters:
        currentStep -
        renderTargetStep -
        traceMap -
        Returns:

      • removeCurrentStepDataFromTraceMapWhenStepBack

        protected boolean removeCurrentStepDataFromTraceMapWhenStepBack(String currentStep,
                                                    String renderTargetStep)
        The sub classes could tell us whether we should remove the current step data from trace map when we back to the previous step. By default, it returns true always.
        Parameters:
        currentStep -
        renderTargetStep -
        Returns:

      • skipSaveTraceMap

        protected boolean skipSaveTraceMap(String currentStep,
                       String renderTargetStep,
                       Map<String,Object> traceMap)
        Since we are lacking of necessary step information to judge if we should save or not, we only do the basic judgment for the init step. The sub class have the responsibility to handle other cases.
        See Also:
        MultiStepFormFlowHandler.skipSaveTraceMap(String, String, Map)

      • cachedTraceMapLivingTimeInMilliSeconds

        protected long cachedTraceMapLivingTimeInMilliSeconds()
        Sub classes can override this method to customize how long the form flow trace data will keep alive.

        The default value is 30 minutes.

        Returns:

      • passDataToSnippet

        protected void passDataToSnippet(String currentStep,
                     String renderTargetStep,
                     Map<String,Object> traceMap)
        Sub classes can override this method to customize how to pass data to snippet.

        This method will retrieve the form of render target from trace map and if it does not exists, the form of current step will be used. By default, the render target form is not set so the current step form will be used always. The sub classes could override this method to store the render target form to trace map before calling super.

        Parameters:
        currentStep -
        renderTargetStep -
        traceMap -

      • passDataToSnippetByFlash

        protected boolean passDataToSnippetByFlash(String currentStep,
                               String renderTargetStep,
                               T form)
        Sub classes should tell us whether we should pass data to snippet via flash scope. The default is false.
        Parameters:
        currentStep -
        renderTargetStep -
        form -
        result -
        Returns:

      • process

        protected CommonFormResult process(FormProcessData processData,
                       T form)
        The default process will only call the #processValidation(Object) and sub classes can override this method to add extra process logics such as updating form when validation succeeds.
        Parameters:
        processData -
        form -
        Returns:
